languages.text: "Единица Оптикон-22 была достойным представителем Эксплораторов. На концептуальном уровне мученичество для него было тождественно окончательному успеху в исполнении функции служения Омниссии. Сожаление неуместно, в последний миг функционирования он предположительно испытывал наивысшую форму восторга веры".

"Unit Opticon-22 was a worthy representative of the Explorators. On a conceptual level, he perceived martyrdom as equivalent to a definitive success in performing his function of serving the Omnissiah. Expressions of regret are inappropriate, for I estimate that in his final functional moments, he experienced the highest form of pious exultation."
languages.original_text: "Единица Оптикон-22 была достойным представителем Эксплораторов. На концептуальном уровне мученичество для него было тождественно окончательному успеху в исполнении функции служения Омниссии. Сожаление неуместно, в последний миг функционирования он предположительно испытывал наивысшую форму восторга веры".

languages.text: “奥普蒂孔22号是开拓者的杰出代表。从概念的层面而言，他认为殉难等同于成功履行了侍奉欧姆尼塞亚这一职能。在这种时候表示遗憾，恐怕并不合适，因为据我推测，他在履行职能的最后时刻，肯定经历了最高程度的虔敬喜悦。”
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 was a worthy representative of the Explorators. On a conceptual level, he perceived martyrdom as equivalent to a definitive success in performing his function of serving the Omnissiah. Expressions of regret are inappropriate, for I estimate that in his final functional moments, he experienced the highest form of pious exultation."

traits.locale_text: “奥普蒂孔22号是开拓者的杰出代表。从概念的层面而言，他认为殉难等同于成功履行了侍奉欧姆尼塞亚这一职能。在这种时候表示遗憾，恐怕并不合适，因为据我推测，他在履行职能的最后时刻，肯定经历了最高程度的虔敬喜悦。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'unité Opticon-22 était un digne représentant des Explorators. D'un point de vue conceptuel, il estimait le martyre équivalent à une victoire irréfutable dans le cadre de ses fonctions au service de l'Omnimessie. Il n'y a donc pas de regret à avoir : pendant ses derniers instants fonctionnels, il a très certainement connu la forme la plus pure d'exaltation mystique. »
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 was a worthy representative of the Explorators. On a conceptual level, he perceived martyrdom as equivalent to a definitive success in performing his function of serving the Omnissiah. Expressions of regret are inappropriate, for I estimate that in his final functional moments, he experienced the highest form of pious exultation."

traits.locale_text: « L'unité Opticon-22 était un digne représentant des Explorators. D'un point de vue conceptuel, il estimait le martyre équivalent à une victoire irréfutable dans le cadre de ses fonctions au service de l'Omnimessie. Il n'y a donc pas de regret à avoir : pendant ses derniers instants fonctionnels, il a très certainement connu la forme la plus pure d'exaltation mystique. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「オプティコン-22機はエクスプロレイターの代表としてふさわしい人物だった。概念的なレベルでは、彼は殉教を万機神に捧げるという自分の職務を遂行する上での決定的な成功と同等に受け止めていた。残念…と言うのは不適切だろう。機能が停止する最後の瞬間、彼は最高の敬虔な歓喜を味わったと私は思っている」
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 was a worthy representative of the Explorators. On a conceptual level, he perceived martyrdom as equivalent to a definitive success in performing his function of serving the Omnissiah. Expressions of regret are inappropriate, for I estimate that in his final functional moments, he experienced the highest form of pious exultation."

traits.locale_text: 「オプティコン-22機はエクスプロレイターの代表としてふさわしい人物だった。概念的なレベルでは、彼は殉教を万機神に捧げるという自分の職務を遂行する上での決定的な成功と同等に受け止めていた。残念…と言うのは不適切だろう。機能が停止する最後の瞬間、彼は最高の敬虔な歓喜を味わったと私は思っている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La unidad Opticon-22 era un representante más que digno de los Exploradores. Para él, a nivel ideológico, el martirio era sinónimo del cumplimiento de su labor como siervo del Omnissiah. Las expresiones de pesar no tienen cabida, pues estimo que en sus últimos momentos funcionales experimentó la forma más elevada de solaz».
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 was a worthy representative of the Explorators. On a conceptual level, he perceived martyrdom as equivalent to a definitive success in performing his function of serving the Omnissiah. Expressions of regret are inappropriate, for I estimate that in his final functional moments, he experienced the highest form of pious exultation."

traits.locale_text: «La unidad Opticon-22 era un representante más que digno de los Exploradores. Para él, a nivel ideológico, el martirio era sinónimo del cumplimiento de su labor como siervo del Omnissiah. Las expresiones de pesar no tienen cabida, pues estimo que en sus últimos momentos funcionales experimentó la forma más elevada de solaz».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Einheit Opticon-22 war ein würdiger Repräsentant der Exploratoren. Auf konzeptioneller Ebene hat er das Märtyrertum als Äquivalent zu einem definitiven Erfolg bei der Ausführung seiner Funktion des Diensts am Omnissiah erreicht. Reuebekundungen sind unangemessen, denn meiner Einschätzung zufolge hat er in seinen letzten funktionalen Momenten die höchste Form des frommen Jubels erlebt."
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 was a worthy representative of the Explorators. On a conceptual level, he perceived martyrdom as equivalent to a definitive success in performing his function of serving the Omnissiah. Expressions of regret are inappropriate, for I estimate that in his final functional moments, he experienced the highest form of pious exultation."

traits.locale_text: "Einheit Opticon-22 war ein würdiger Repräsentant der Exploratoren. Auf konzeptioneller Ebene hat er das Märtyrertum als Äquivalent zu einem definitiven Erfolg bei der Ausführung seiner Funktion des Diensts am Omnissiah erreicht. Reuebekundungen sind unangemessen, denn meiner Einschätzung zufolge hat er in seinen letzten funktionalen Momenten die höchste Form des frommen Jubels erlebt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Opticon-22 birimi, Keşiftörler'in değerli bir temsilcisiydi. Terimsel bağlamda konuşacak olursak şehitlik mertebesine erişti, bu da Hermesih'e hizmet etme işlevi bakımından kusursuz bir başarıdır. Pişmanlık sözcükleri, bu durumda uygunsuz kaçıyor zira işlevsel olduğu son anlarında dinî iftiharın doruklarını deneyimlediğini varsayıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Unit Opticon-22 was a worthy representative of the Explorators. On a conceptual level, he perceived martyrdom as equivalent to a definitive success in performing his function of serving the Omnissiah. Expressions of regret are inappropriate, for I estimate that in his final functional moments, he experienced the highest form of pious exultation."
